Class GLTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.GLTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Texture

    public class GLTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Texture
    Manages OpenGL textures. This class will be used in the "Texturing and Shading" project.
